TextView.android:text: 1) Pointing to a photograph of a boy Suresh said, 'He is the son of the only son of my mother.' How is Suresh related to that boy?
View Answer
Answer : Option D \n The boy in the photograph is the only son of the son of Suresh's mother i.e., the son of Suresh. Hence, Suresh is the father of boy.

2)If A + B means A is the mother of B; A - B means A is the brother B; A % B means A is the father of B and A x B \n means A is the sister of B, which of the following shows that P is the maternal uncle of Q?
View Answer

Answer : Option C 
 Explanation: 
 P - M → P is the brother of M 
 M + N → M is the mother of N 
 N x Q → N is the sister of Q 
 Therefore, P is the maternal uncle of Q.
3.If A is the brother of B; B is the sister of C; and C is the father of D, how D is related to A?
View Answer

Answer : Option D 
 If D is Male, the answer is Nephew. 
 If D is Female, the answer is Niece. 
 As the sex of D is not known, hence, the relation between D and A cannot be determined. 
 Note: Niece - A daughter of one's brother or sister, or of one's brother-in-law or sister-in-law. Nephew - A son of 
 one's brother or sister, or of one's brother-in-law or sister-in-law.
4.If A + B means A is the brother of B; A - B means A is the sister of B and A x B means A is the father of B. \n Which of the following means that C is the son of M?

RadioButton.android:text: A) M - N x C + F
B) F - C + N x M
C) N + M - F x C
D) M x N - C + F

TextView.android:text: View Answer

Answer : Option D 
 M x N → M is the father of N 
 N - C → N is the sister of C 
 and C + F → C is the brother of F.
 Hence, M is the father of C or C is the son of M.
5)Introducing a boy, a girl said, 'He is the son of the daughter of the father of my uncle.' How is the boy related to the girl?
View Answer
Answer : Option A \n The father of the boy's uncle → the grandfather of the boy and daughter of the grandfather → sister of father.
6)Pointing to a photograph Mark says, 'He is the son of the only son of my grandfather.' How is the man in the photograph related to Mark
View Answer
Answer : Option A \n The man in the photograph is the son of the only son of Mark's grandfather i.e., the man is the son of Mark's father. \n Hence, the man is the brother of Mark.
7)If A + B means A is the brother of B; A x B means A is the son of B; and A % B means B is the daughter of A then which of the following means M is the maternal uncle of N?
View Answer
Answer : Option D \n Because the sex of O is not known
8)If D is the brother of B, how B is related to C? To answer this question which of the statements is/are necessary? \n 1.The son of D is the grandson of C. \n 2.B is the sister of D.
View Answer

Answer : Option D 
 Given: D is the brother of B. 
 From statement 1, we can detect that D is son of C (son of D is the grandson of C). 
 From statement 2, we can detect that B is 'Female' (sister of D).
 Therefore, B is daughter of C.

9)If A + B means A is the father of B; A - B means A is the brother B; A % B means A is the wife of B and A x B \n means A is the mother of B, which of the following shows that M is the maternal grandmother of T?

RadioButton.android:text: D)M x N x S % T

TextView.android:text: View Answer

Answer : Option A 
 M x N → M is the mother of N 
 N % S → N is the wife of S 
 and S + T → is the father of T 
 Hence, M is the maternal grandmother of T.
10)Pointing to a photograph. Bajpai said, 'He is the son of the only daughter of the father of my brother.' How Bajpai is related to the man in the photograph?
View Answer
Answer : Option D \n The man in the photo is the son of the sister of Bajpai. Hence, Bajpai is the maternal uncle of the man in the photograph.
11)Introducing a man, a woman said, 'He is the only son of the mother of my mother.' How is the woman related to the man?
View Answer
Answer : Option C \n The man is the only son of the mother of the woman. Hence, the man is the maternal uncle of the woman. So, the woman is the niece of the man.
12)Pointing to Gopi, Nalni says, 'I am the daughter of the only son of his grandfather.' How Nalni is related to Gopi?
View Answer
Answer : Option C \n Nalni is the daughter of the only son of Gopi's grandfather. Hence, it's clear that Nalni is the sister of Gopi.
13)A's son B is married with C whose sister D is married to E the brother of B. How D is related to A?
View Answer

Answer : Option B 
 Since E is the brother of B 
 Therefore, A is the father of E 
 but D is the wife of E. 
 Hence, D is the daughter-in-law of A.
14)Pointing to a lady a person said, 'The son of her only brother is the brother of my wife.' How is the lady related to the person?
View Answer

Answer : Option C \n Brother of person's wife → brother-in-law of the person. Hence, the son of lady's brother is brother-in-law of the person.\n Therefore, the brother of the lady is the father-in-law of the person. Hence, the lady is the sister of the person's father-in-law.

15)A $ B means A is the father of B; A # B means A is the sister of B; A * B means A is the daughter of B and A @ B means A is the brother of B. Which of the following indicates that M is the wife of Q?
View Answer

Answer : Option D 
 Q $ R → Q is the father of R 
 R @ T → R is the brother of T 
 Hence, → Q is the father of T 
 T * M → T is the daughter of M
16)If P + Q means P is the brother of Q; P x Q means P is the father of Q and P - Q means P is the sister of Q, which of the following relations shows that I is the niece of K?
View Answer

Answer : Option B 
 K + Y → K is the brother of Y 
 Y x I → Y is the father of I 
 Hence, → K is the uncle of I 
 and I - Z → I is the sister of Z 
 Hence, → I is the niece of K

17)If A $ B means B is the father of A; A # B means B is the mother of A; A * B means B is the sister of A and A @ B means B is the husband of A, which of the following indicates that N is the grandmother of P?
View Answer
Answer : Option D
18)If P + Q means P is the brother of Q; P x Q means P is the wife of Q and P % Q means P is the daughter of Q then which of the following means D is the uncle of A?
View Answer
Answer : Option D
19)Which of the following means that N is the maternal uncle of M?

RadioButton.android:text: A)N β P - L + E - M

TextView.android:text: View Answer

Answer : Option A 
 N β P → N is the brother of P 
 P - L → P is the sister of L 
 L + E → L is the mother of E 
 E - M → E is the sister of M. 
 Hence, L is the mother of M, P is the maternal aunt of M and N is the maternal uncle of M.
20)Which of the following shows the relation that C is the granddaughter of E?
View Answer

Answer : Option C 
 C @ B → C is the sister of B 
 B % F → B is the son of F 
 Hence, → C is the daughter of F 
 F % E → F is the son of E 
 Hence, → C is the granddaughter of E.
